attributes.action: Disclosure of military knowledge of UFOs and ETs
attributes.additional_details: People have the right to know by now. The government has known about this since WW11.
attributes.background: Let people know what the military knows about ETs and UFOs.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make an FOI Request to the Ministry of Defence at:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-defence
